summary: This is a cover sheet from Cingular Wireless's National Compliance Center responding to an FBI request for cell phone records. It confirms the provision of information for four target phone numbers covering January 1, 2004, to the present date (August 2006) and provides updated contact instructions for future legal requests.

events.title: FBI Request for Phone Records
events.description: The FBI submitted a legal request for cell phone records, which is referenced as being received on this date.

events.title: Cingular Wireless Response to FBI
events.description: Cingular Wireless's National Compliance Center sends a response cover sheet and a CD containing cell phone information for four target numbers from January 1, 2004, to present.

locations: PO BOX 24679 WEST PALM BEACH, FL 33416-4679
keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking cell phone records from Cingular Wireless as part of an investigation in August 2006.
The request targeted four specific phone numbers, and information was provided from January 1, 2004, to the date of the response.
The document indicates cell site location information would only be provided with a proper search warrant, court order, or under 18 U.S.C. ยง2703(d).
The response includes updated contact instructions, directing future legal requests to 'Cingular Wireless' at a specific fax number.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and 'Official Use Only', indicating the sensitive nature of the law enforcement request.
